pages.text: $(italic)Whenever you pick up one of those little green orbs that appear whenever you kill an enemy, you get smarter - supposedly.$(br2)However, the inevitable death by clumsiness means that you always lose this experience quickly. Crystallized and safely stored in your chests, however, they will be as safe as can be.$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: A Gem can hold up to 10.000 experience. $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanting$() it with $(thing)Efficiency$() increases that limit, $(thing)Quick Charge$() boosts the pushing/pulling of XP.
